body: [](http://api.ning.com:80/files/5R3yBX2dACVS7J4Qb4moTZMcF8lgketRgE2WzHFykwGzgxKU8HH9DSxhWcz*nOn*WixS0rEWvrRVZBuJVfTQ3Oxc8cyDQEOY/zzzz.JPG) Hi, I wast just wondering why the normalize node was removed for the Read EP Result component, the Read EP Surface Result component still has it. [](http://api.ning.com:80/files/5R3yBX2dACVS7J4Qb4moTZMcF8lgketRgE2WzHFykwGzgxKU8HH9DSxhWcz*nOn*WixS0rEWvrRVZBuJVfTQ3Oxc8cyDQEOY/zzzz.JPG) I could use the Normalize Data by Floor Area (NDbFA) component but it seems to have problems reading data trees. I could explode the data tree but that would require a single 'NDbFA' component for each zone. [](http://api.ning.com:80/files/5R3yBX2dACVS7J4Qb4moTZMcF8lgketRgE2WzHFykwGzgxKU8HH9DSxhWcz*nOn*WixS0rEWvrRVZBuJVfTQ3Oxc8cyDQEOY/zzzz.JPG)
